# [Interview #1133: Chicago, Entry #71](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1133#71)

#### Question

Can I generally ask what the plot is somewhat like for Wayne and Wax?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yeah, so there is a murderer in town who is not human.
